definition: Pingchuan district of Baiyin city 白銀市|白银市[Bai2 yin2 shi4], Gansu
an expanse of flat land
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
river/creek/plain/an area of level country
flat land one could gallop straight across (idiom); wide expanse of flat country
Pingchuan district of Baiyin city 白銀市|白银市[Bai2 yin2 shi4], Gansu

sentences.english: There are one or two hills in Norfolk, but otherwise the landscape is as flat as a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 诺福克有一两座小山丘，但除此之外是一马平川。

sentences.english: Hirakawa's photographs are described as having "a heavy sexual connotation".
sentences.chinese: 平川的摄影被描述为有着“强烈的性暗示”。

sentences.english: Whatever happened, we work high above the ground like a spider.
sentences.chinese: 无论高难险阻，我们的高空作业“蜘蛛人”一马平川。

sentences.english: World roof Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, the Northeast Plain, MA Hirakawa.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原世屋脊，东北平原马平川。

sentences.english: I like going climbing. That's why I dislike areas that are as flat as a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢登山，因此我不喜欢一马平川的地方。
